channel.title: Designer at buzzvil on Maxence Mauduit
channel.description: Recent content in Designer at buzzvil on Maxence Mauduit

item.title: About
item.description: This website uses the light-weight Hugo Framework coupled with the Theme Ananke as my starter. I keep the repository public on my Github if you want to have a look at it. üòè Ananke is based on the truly impressive Tachyons CSS Library.

item.title: Design peer reviews to support our team growth
item.description: I always hope to see my teammates collaborate more. Now that we are at a stage of faster growth, more fellow designers are going to join us and it felt like a good timing to push forward this all peer-review strategy. It‚Äôs never too late. We‚Äôve been a team of 4 designers for the last 2 years, including 2 product / 2 visual designers. Collaboration & Review have been naturally there as soon as the team got 2 product designers, but it‚Äôs never been a thing across the entire team, probably due to the fact that some of our designers are working remotely, bringing communication issues.

item.title: Design system at Buzzvil
item.description: Design system vs startup. Takeaways. We built a Design system. It took us time, resources and a lot of energy, involving pretty much everyone in our design team. And it‚Äôs just the beginning of a long story. If you are working at a startup and are considering building a design system, you might find clues reading about our experience. First off, we can‚Äôt ignore how time consuming building a system can be.

item.title: Why and how we decided to drastically change our design toolbox in 2019
item.description: Hi, I‚Äôm Max and I lead a team of designers at Buzzvil. When we‚Äôve decided last year to drastically change our design toolbox, I was pleased to find plenty of insights from other teams around the world. This post talks about our decisions and related needs! To give a quick background, we are a team of 5 designers located in Seoul and Taipei. The team counts 3 Product designers including myself and 2 visual - Brand designers.
